headline: GE HealthCare Receives FDA Clearance for Head-Only SIGNA MAGNUS 3.0T MRI System
summary: CHICAGO, November 13, 2024--GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) has received FDA 510(k) clearance for its innovative SIGNA™ MAGNUS,i a 3.0T high-performance, head-only magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scanner. This system offers new capabilities for both clinical imaging and neuroscience with the potential to aid in the detection of neurological, oncological, and psychiatric conditions.
